articles.description: Chelsea: Ajax post incredible 'best of Hakim Ziyech' video on his final day with the club
articles.content:
Hakim Ziyech bids farewell to Ajax today.
The Moroccan playmaker sealed a move to Chelsea halfway through the 2019/20 season and he will now join up with his new team tomorrow.
Ziyech's stock in th… [+1754 chars]
